p.d: Nestling 500 metres above the shores of Lake Geneva, in Évian-les-Bains, the Hôtel Royal was considered the finest hotel in the world when it was created in 1909. The Michelin-starred chef Patrice Vander manages the luxury hotel's three restaurants: Les Fresques, La Véranda and L'Oliveraie. Presented by: Odile Mattei.
